articles.title: UK's Omicron restrictions on African countries are 'travel apartheid' - Metro.co.uk
articles.description: African leaders and UN officials argue the supposedly mild Omicron variant is already in Europe and the US.
articles.content:

articles.title: French cheese product imported by Cold Storage recalled due to 'possible' presence of bacteria - channelnewsasia.com
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: A cheese product imported from France has been recalled due to the "possible presence" of listeria monocytogenes, a bacteria that can cause foodborne illness.

articles.title: UEFA will not reschedule Spurs clash against Rennes - CNA
articles.description:
Tottenham Hotspur's Europa Conference League group game against Rennes will not be played after it was called off this week because of COVID-19 infections in the Premier League club, European football's governing body said on Saturday (Dec 11).
